You are just walking down the street, avoiding as many gross things as possible, when suddenly you hear loud stomping. Citizens of the town run in fear, as you hear a manly voice echo...

Himcules, a man named after the demi-god, he gains strength from the pain, embarrassment, or humiliation he enflicts on his victims. He was thrown in jail, how is he back?
As Jenny's sidekick (next to your brother, of course), you can't just let him loot the town like this, and you call out for Jenny. She doesn't show up, and now Himcules knows of you. This is bad.
"Ah, I remember you," the giant god-like man said to you, towering above you. You know he won't let you go now, but before you get a chance to run, he grabs your shoulder. You look back in dire fear as he smiles sadistically down at you.
"Boy, I can have some fun putting you in your place, kid."

With that, Vlad raised his hand and a ghostly glow surrounded the chair. Vlad had conjured a rope which tied Danny down to the chair in a position that stuck his head to the cushion part. Danny was helpless and immobile as he fearfully watched Vlad's round, perfected ass onto his face.

FAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRTTT!!!

"Oh well listen to that. I guess I still got a few left in me. What do you say Daniel? Shall I finish you off?"

Danny grunted in helpless frustration as Vlad continued to beat him simply by sitting on his face. Fart after fart left Danny dazed, he hardly had any fight left in him.

Vlad chuckled as he felt Danny weaken beneath his ass. He decided to untie Danny from the chair, then he squeezed his ass cheeks together and used them to lift Danny's face off the chair. Then BAM!! He slammed Danny back down while squashing the poor hero's face once again.

Vlad got off Danny and turned around so that he could admire his handy work. His defeated foe had been pummeled and farted on immensely. Yet Vlad couldnt decide what he enjoyed doing with his improved physique more. Punching Danny around with his huge arms, or humiliating him with farts from his huge ass.

Vlad smirked as he decided to continue...
1531111.title: tie Danny down to a chair to be a cushion

choices: Otto Rocket is tortured by Lars
15433.title: Other

choices: Lars stuffs him in the back of his underwear
Lars traps him in his armpit
154331.content:
Otto Rocket loved to ride. In fact, he was skating about, grinding on railings, forcing people to dive out of the way, narrowly avoiding people moving furniture, the usual for "Ottomatic." But, despite his best efforts, his riding was gonna get him into a heap of trouble.

He was in the middle of grinding a rail, while, without his knowledge, one rude dude was crossing the corner. The moments Otto hopped off the rail, this dude crossed right in front of him.

"Watch out, dude!" Otto shouted. The dude turned, just in time for 1) him to see Otto riding right at him, and 2) Otto to realize this dude happened to be local rude dude, Lars Rodriguez.

"Gah!" he shouted in realization. The two collide, Otto tackling over him. "Grah! What's your problem, dude?!"

"Hey! It's not my fault I didn't see you!"

"And what? I should've seen you?" Otto picked up his skateboard, checking it for damage. "Don't ignore me while I'm yelling at you!"

"C'mon, I've gotta get back to shredding." Before Otto could "shred" anymore, Lars grabbed him by the shirt collar and throws shoves him against the nearby wall.

"No way, dude! You've gone too far this time!" He suddenly picked up a vial of powder.

"What's that funk y'got there?" Before Lars answered, he uncorked the bottle, pours it into his hand, and blows it into Otto's face. He coughs and coughs. As he coughed, he didn't notice something worrying: he was shrinking! After his coughing fit, he shrunk to the size of an ant. Otto realized this when he looked up at Lars' cruel grin.
154331.title: Otto Rocket is tortured by Lars

choices: He pounds the bulge in the back of his pants
1543311.content:
Lars grabbed Otto and moves his hand towards his back. He hooked the back off his drawers with his finger, then pulled it back, revealing his backside. Otto struggled even harder in Lars grips, but it was for not. He lets go, and Otto falls, right into his pants. He removed his finger, his pants shutting with a snap.

"How y'like that?" Lars taunted. Otto tried his hardest to punch and push against Lars' backside.

"Cut it out?!" Otto tried to shout. Unfortunately, even if Lars could here him, it wouldn't matter. He hears a foreboding rumbling, and a chill runs up his spine in response. His struggles are answered with a nasty fart. He coughed and groaned at the stench.

"How's that, 'Ottomatic'?" He continued farting on him. Unfortunately, he went on with it a little too long. As he continued, the powder started to wear off. He grew, filling out his shorts, forcing him up against his butt. "Well, that's mildly inconvenient..."
1543311.title: Lars stuffs him in the back of his underwear

15433112.content:
As Otto stretched his pants out, it squeezed against hi waist, making him extremely uncomfortable. As if running into him wasn't bad enough, this punk had the nerve to strain his waist.

"Why'd you gotta go doing that?!" Lars shouted as he punched at the bulge Otto formed. Otto squirmed at the hit. "Didn't like that one, huh?" He kept punching and punching. Otto squirmed more and more, not only because it hurt, but because it was pressing him deeper and deeper against his butt. Lars stopped punching, and positioned his rear towards the wall. "You're gonna hate this then!" He thrust his hips backwards, smashing his butt against the wall, and against Otto. Again, it hurt, and again, it pushed him deeper and deeper into his butt.

He kept thrusting and thrusting, and Otto kept punching and punching. After one finally thrust, there was a pause. Otto secretly sighed in relief, believing it was over. But it wasn't. Lars took a running stance, than ran forward. He suddenly kicked his legs out from under him, dropping rear first on the pavement. He skidded a bit, which only hurt Otto even more as he skid. Each skid shoved him up against Lars' backside. He got up, took a running stance, and did the same thing as before. He repeated at least 3 more times, bruises forming on Otto. Once more, Lars took a running start and ran. But, unknown to Otto, he was running straight for a wall. Before he collided, he quickly turned his rear towards it, slamming into it with the momentum he gathered before, smashing Otto harder between him and the wall than before.

Otto would've described the situation as being hit in the back by a truck into a garbage bag. It hurt so bad and smelled so horrible! As if to add insult to injury, after that running slam, Lars continued to slam his ass against the wall, over and over and over. Suddenly, he paused his attack.

"Bet you regret shreddin' on me now, eh?" he taunted. He completed his taunt with a smack to his rear, causing it to jiggle around Otto's face, pressed in between his cheeks.

"This is bogus..." Otto said, barely loud enough for Lars to hear. He grinned at his displeasure.

"If you thought that was bad..." Lars filled the pause with a chuckle. "...we aren't even half way done..."
15433112.title: He pounds the bulge in the back of his pants

• Inspired by the deleted story Nicktoon Farts
• Only men can fart
• Sexual antics are accepted, but don't go too far (ex. tea-bagging is okay, taking dick out of pants=not okay)
EDIT: So I've decided that all sexual activity is okay.
• Mostly Butt and Fart torture
• No Abrupt Ending
• No death
